categories.title: Fusion Box
categories.desc: Our Signature 8 Layer Desi Meal, in a Box! An Amazing Fusion of Flavours. Super Convenient

products.name: Dal Makhni Rice Box
products.details: Creamy Dal Makhni with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. The most satisfying meal ever!

products.name: Chole Chawal Box
products.details: Authentic Amritsari chole with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

products.name: Rajma Chawal Box
products.details: Really good Rajma served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. Comfort meal at it's best!

products.name: Grilled Tikki Box
products.details: Grilled veg patty with a spicy masala curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

products.name: Paneer Masala Box
products.details: Loads of creamy Paneer with a masaledaar curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

categories.title: Curries
categories.desc: Our honest attempt to serve the most authentic Curries. Minus the excessive makhan :)

products.name: Basmati Rice
products.details: Extra-long grain basmati rice steamed with mild & aromatic Desi herbs

products.name: Tawa Paratha
products.details: Garma-garam soft whole wheat parathas made in Desi ghee

products.name: Kadhai Paneer
products.details: Soft paneer simmered in masala curry made with freshly ground spices

products.name: Raita
products.details: Perfect way to complement your feast. Thick masala raita with notes of Cumin & fresh Mint

products.name: Butter Chicken
products.details: Our version of an indulgent butter chicken curry. It's rich, creamy & NOT sweet. It's the real deal

categories.title: Biryani
categories.desc: A Traditional Dum Preparation. Extra-Long Grain Basmati Rice & Aromatic Whole Spices. Indulge in the Feast.

products.name: Sahi Panner Biryani
products.details: Extra-long basmati rice cooked with loads of fire-grilled paneer tikkas & whole spices. Burst of flavours in every bite! Served with Raita

products.name: Firangi Subz Biryani
products.details: Baby corn, Mushroom & Paneer cooked in biryani masala & layered over fragrant basmati rice. A mind blowing fusion! Served with Raita

products.name: Chicken Tikka Biryani
products.details: Smoked Chicken-Tikka slow cooked with fragrant basmati rice & whole spices. A truly novel experience! Served with Raita

products.name: Murg Dum Biryani
products.details: Succulent chicken (boneless) layered over aromatic super-long grain rice, slow cooked in quintessential dum style! Served with Raita

categories.title: Wraps
categories.desc: Whole Wheat (NOT Maida) Paratha Base, Stuffed with Delicious Fillings, Oven Baked (NOT fried)

products.name: Paneer Wrap
products.details: Loads of grilled paneer & a mix of exotic veggies dripping in a spicy Desi sauce & Green chutney. Paneer wrap truly done better!

products.name: Chicken Wrap
products.details: Fire roasted spicy chicken wrapped with Green chutney & Onions! Authentic Nawabi taste!

products.name: Mayo Wrap
products.details: Loaded with Fire Grilled Chicken topped with a generous portion of Mayo & the perfect amount of crunchy veggies.

products.name: Tikki Wrap
products.details: Crispy 'Grilled' veg tikki topped generously with mayo & exotic veggies & wrapped in a whole wheat paratha. Lip smacking!

products.name: Patty Wrap
products.details: Oven Grilled all-veg patty with a flavourful tikka sauce wrapped with fresh veggies! Tantalize your Desi taste-buds!

categories.title: Ice Cream
categories.desc: Everything Natural- Seasonal Fruits | Rich Dry Fruits | Premium Chocolate | In 500 ml Tub

products.name: Tender CocoNut
products.details: Chunks of fresh tender coconut pieces slow churned into a subtly flavoured creamy wonder. A coastal dream!

products.name: Sheer Khurma
products.details: The quintessential Ramadan feast now in an ice-cream- A Desi fusion never seen before.
